name: Beach Resort Simulator
description: The South Seas are calling! Summer, sun, beach, and palm trees. Who doesn't pine for a life in the southern clime? This dream is now coming true. Transform a pristine beach into a popular travel destination by using strategic skill and economical thinking. Give free rein to your creativity!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8/7/Vista/XP Processor: 1.6 GHz Dual core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB video memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: took ages to download and when it was fiinally finished it doesnt work
